languages.text: "Знаете, есть такая поговорка — двум чудовищам тесно в одном логове", {n}— с теплом, почти ласково говорит Капеллан.{/n} "Я имею в виду, если б в одном доме оказался демон из варпа и Денз — сбежал или сдох бы в итоге демон. Не наоборот".

traits.locale_text: "Знаете, есть такая поговорка — двум чудовищам тесно в одном логове", {n}— с теплом, почти ласково говорит Капеллан.{/n} "Я имею в виду, если б в одном доме оказался демон из варпа и Денз — сбежал или сдох бы в итоге демон. Не наоборот".

languages.text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."
languages.original_text: "Знаете, есть такая поговорка — двум чудовищам тесно в одном логове", {n}— с теплом, почти ласково говорит Капеллан.{/n} "Я имею в виду, если б в одном доме оказался демон из варпа и Денз — сбежал или сдох бы в итоге демон. Не наоборот".

traits.locale_text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

"You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

"You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

"You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

"You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

languages.text: “一山不容二虎，这句话你肯定听过。”{n}牧师的语气很温和，几乎称得上是亲切。{/n}“我的意思是说，如果丹兹真的和某个亚空间的恶魔碰巧住在同一个地方，那到头来，仓皇逃窜或者一命呜呼的家伙，很有可能是那个恶魔，而不是丹兹。”
languages.original_text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

traits.locale_text: “一山不容二虎，这句话你肯定听过。”{n}牧师的语气很温和，几乎称得上是亲切。{/n}“我的意思是说，如果丹兹真的和某个亚空间的恶魔碰巧住在同一个地方，那到头来，仓皇逃窜或者一命呜呼的家伙，很有可能是那个恶魔，而不是丹兹。”

languages.text: «Se dice que ninguna guarida es lo bastante grande para dos bestias». {n}Capellán habla con amabilidad, casi con ternura.{/n} «Lo que quiero decir es que si Denz y un daemon de la disformidad compartieran el mismo hogar, sería el daemon el que acabaría muerto o desaparecido, no Denz».
languages.original_text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

traits.locale_text: «Se dice que ninguna guarida es lo bastante grande para dos bestias». {n}Capellán habla con amabilidad, casi con ternura.{/n} «Lo que quiero decir es que si Denz y un daemon de la disformidad compartieran el mismo hogar, sería el daemon el que acabaría muerto o desaparecido, no Denz».

languages.text: 「2頭の獣が入れる巣穴はない、ということわざがあります」{n}教戒官はあたたかく、愛情を込めるように言った。{/n}「つまり、デンツと歪みのディーモンが同じ住まいにいたとしたら…ディーモンの方が逃げ出すか、先に死んでいたでしょう。その逆はありえません」
languages.original_text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

traits.locale_text: 「2頭の獣が入れる巣穴はない、ということわざがあります」{n}教戒官はあたたかく、愛情を込めるように言った。{/n}「つまり、デンツと歪みのディーモンが同じ住まいにいたとしたら…ディーモンの方が逃げ出すか、先に死んでいたでしょう。その逆はありえません」

languages.text: "Gut, es gibt ein Sprichwort, das besagt, dass kein Bau groß genug für zwei Bestien ist", {n}sagt Ordenspriester warm, fast herzlich.{/n} "Aber falls Denz und ein Dämon aus dem Warp wirklich im selben Haus gelandet sind – dann wäre die geflohene oder tote Partei der Dämon. Nicht Denz."
languages.original_text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

traits.locale_text: "Gut, es gibt ein Sprichwort, das besagt, dass kein Bau groß genug für zwei Bestien ist", {n}sagt Ordenspriester warm, fast herzlich.{/n} "Aber falls Denz und ein Dämon aus dem Warp wirklich im selben Haus gelandet sind – dann wäre die geflohene oder tote Partei der Dämon. Nicht Denz."

languages.text: « Vous savez, il existe un dicton disant que nul antre n'est assez grand pour abriter deux bêtes, {n}dit Chapelain d'une voix douce, presque affectueuse.{/n} Je veux dire par là que si Denz avait cohabité avec un démon du Warp, c'est le démon qui aurait fini par fuir ou par mourir, et pas l'inverse. Vous pouvez me croire. »
languages.original_text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, il existe un dicton disant que nul antre n'est assez grand pour abriter deux bêtes, {n}dit Chapelain d'une voix douce, presque affectueuse.{/n} Je veux dire par là que si Denz avait cohabité avec un démon du Warp, c'est le démon qui aurait fini par fuir ou par mourir, et pas l'inverse. Vous pouvez me croire. »

languages.text: "İki cambaz bir ipte oynamaz diye bir söz vardır. Eminim bilirsiniz." {n}Papaz'ın ses tonu samimi, hatta şefkat dolu.{/n} "Yani Denz ve bir öteboyut iblisi aynı çatı altında bulunacak olsa tabanları yağlayacak veya defteri dürülecek kişi iblis olurdu. Öbür türlüsü mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "You know, there's a saying that no lair is big enough for two beasts," {n}Chaplain says warmly, almost affectionately.{/n} "What I mean is, if Denz and some daemon from the warp happened to share the same house — the one who'd run or wind up dead would be the daemon. Not the other way around."

traits.locale_text: "'İki cambaz bir ipte oynamaz.' diye bir söz vardır, bilir misiniz?" {n}diyor Papaz, samimi ve hatta şefkat dolu bir şekilde.{/n} "Yani Denz ve bir öteboyut iblisi aynı çatı altında bulunacak olsa amel defteri kapanacak kişi iblis olurdu. Öbür türlüsü mümkün değil."
